name_title: Alfred Dunner® Essential Pull On Capri Pant
description: You'll return to our Alfred Dunner pull-on capris again and again when you want an updated, casual look and all the comfort you love.   elastic waistband approx. 19-21" inseam slash pockets polyester washable imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"You never have to worry about the fit...Alfred Dunner clothing sizes are true to size and fits perfectly. Great value for the money."}, {"review_2"=>"Good quality fabric. Perfect fit. Washed very well no iron."}, {"review_3"=>"I do not normally wear pants or capris that have an elastic waist, but I decided to try these since they were on sale and I loved the color. I was very surprised at how comfortable they are and wear really well even wearing all day. I will buy this style again!"}, {"review_4"=>"I love these capris! They fit true to size and are so comfortable to wear. I am planning to order more of them."}, {"review_5"=>"This product is very comfortable and the fabric launders very well"}, {"review_6"=>"I did not like the fabric. It is 100% polyester I thought it was different.I bought one at the store apprx two monts ago, and I thought it was just like it"}, {"review_7"=>"What a great deal. Beautiful Pants. Its more than I expected."}, {"review_8"=>"Alfred Dunner has great pants, good fit and very comfortable"}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Featuring mixed fabrics and a figure-flattering silhouette, our sleeveless lace fit-and-flare dress is anything but ordinary. scoopneck back zip 40" length from shoulder cotton/nylon/polyester/spandex polyester lining hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"This is beautiful. It fit fantastic and flatters my curves. Highly recommend."}, {"review_2"=>"Purchased this dress for my daughter who is a size 8 its very pretty and flattering for the figure"}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Elegant and flattering, you'll love showing off in our lace fit-and-flare dress. scoopneck back zipper sleeveless 37½" length from shoulder nylon/cotton polyester lining hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>{"review_1"=>"I purchased this dress for my bridal shower and it is perfect. I love the color and cut. Very flattering."}}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Vertical Seam Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Look darling in our sleeveless lace fit-and-flare dress, perfect for all your warm-weather gatherings. roundneck sleeveless exposed back zipper 38" length from shoulder lined lace polyester hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I love this dress! At first, I wasn't sure about the nude lining, which you can see, through the lace. But it's perfect! Fits well and flows great. I'll be wearing it to a wedding at the shore in August. Couldn't have asked for a better dress."}, {"review_2"=>"The dress fits perfectly and looks as it was pictured. I love the color of the lace with the beige underlay. I plan to wear it to my granddaughters wedding with beige lace flats and carry a beige half sweater in case I need something on my arms. Love it!!!"}, {"review_3"=>"I purchased this for my daughter to wear under her graduation robe. She love it the moment she tried it on....."}, {"review_4"=>"Love the color, love the design, love the feel of the dress. A simply lovely dress."}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Mesh Shantung Polka Dot Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: Our absolutely charming fit-and-flare dress sings with plucky polka dots and a mesh yoke that's unstoppable.   scoopneck sleeveless exposed back zipper belt included approx. 36¼" length from shoulder lined polyester mesh yoke: polyester/spandex taffeta lining: polyester dry clean only imported
Reviews: {"review"=>{"review_1"=>"In love with that dress! This dress is elegant and chic, perfect for work or a cocktail."}}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Polka Dot Chiffon Maxi Dress
description: Timeless polka dots and a flirty front keyhole give our sleeveless maxi dress the chic charm you adore. scoopneck sleeveless exposed back zipper 58" length from shoulder lined chiffon polyester machine wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"Can't wait to wear it for our sons wedding. It fits really well and will be a very comfortable for the days events."}, {"review_2"=>"Very cute dress. nice feel and comfort .I like the Maxi style dress; this dress can be worn in corporate america and to outdoor social events."}, {"review_3"=>"I bought this for my daughter, it is a very pretty, feminine dress. The styling of is so nice, love the chiffon overlay. The pleating on top will help as she is bigger on top. Just love it!"}, {"review_4"=>"would look good on a younger woman who still has a waist. alas, I have lost mine. If you happen to find it, please return it."}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Polka Dot Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: Capture the casual elegance of the past in our modern fit-and-flare dress. roundneck sleeveless 35⅝" length from shoulder invisible zipper in back polyester dry clean only imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"The fabric of this dress is very stiff and scratchy, synthetic (luckily it is lined). The gathers at the waist tend to pouf out because of the stiffness of the fabric. I bought a petite size, but the torso length was too long. Since I liked the dress otherwise, I took the shoulders apart and deepened the seams."}, {"review_2"=>"Got this dress for summer wear. I am 5' 4\" and this dress fits me perfect. I usually wear a size 2 but I got the 4P size and this hits right at the knee and has a flattering fit."}, {"review_3"=>"The dress is very cute. It runs a little small. I would order the next size up."}, {"review_4"=>"I really like this dress. It fits perfectly, and the fab is high quality."}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Striped Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: Our absolutely charming fit-and-flare dress sings with bright stripes and a few contrast ones thrown in to add a lovely mystique.   squareneck sleeveless exposed back zipper belt included approx. 35" length from shoulder polyester washable imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"The style and fit are perfect. The colors are much more vibrant than shown. I love the light weight fabric which will be perfect for summer weather."}, {"review_2"=>"This dress looks really cute. The fabric is not comfortable at all. It has bumps in it with the design. Plus the dress doesn't look good on an older woman. It must be worn by someone in their 20's or younger."}]}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Striped Shantung Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: You'll be on their minds long after you've left in the vibrant hues of our striped shantung dress, complete with a grosgrain belt and exposed back zipper. extended shoulders exposed back zipper ribbon bow-belt 36½" length from shoulder shantung polyester lined machine wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>{"review_1"=>"I was so happy to see the beautiful colors and fabric of this dress when I opened the box from my online purchase....but alas, it wouldn't even come close to zipping up! Very strange, as every other dress I've ordered by Danny & Nicole has been true to size. Word to the wise: order one size up...but do order, because it's a gorgeous dress!"}}

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Stripe Fit-and-Flare Dress - Plus
description: Our figure-flattering fit-and-flare dress is designed in a bold stripe fabric with on-trend mixed materials. scoopneck sleeveless exposed zipper in back 43" length from shoulder polyester/spandex machine wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"Perfect for everyday wear to work. Love it. Able to dress down and dress up."}, {"review_2"=>"I received many compliments wearing this dress. It fit well and was very flattering. Washes well in cold water - low fluff in dryer and back on the hanger. No Muss - No Fuss. I'm downsizing and (4 sizes - so far) I can always count on Danny and Nicole fashions to fit me well even as I transition out of plus sizes forever!!!!"}, {"review_3"=>"I got this dress to wear to a wedding. It is very comfortable and very flattering. I'm short 5'2\" and the length of the dress hit me just right. The stripes do not make you look fat, somehow they are flattering. I will wear a lace shrug with it, and it looks great."}, {"review_4"=>"This dress was good quality, but the pattern and cut was NOT flattering at all."}]}

name_title: Dan Post® Genuine Teju Lizard Boots

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Flyaway Tankini Swim Top
description: Go for bold with our black-and-white print tankini swim top featuring a flyaway front for maximum beach fun. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I looked everywhere for a swim top. I could not find anything at the regular stores, you know the usual. My mom said that I should look at JC Penney because there was a better selection. She wasn't kidding! I tried on a couple of swim tops and found exactly what I was looking for. The fit is perfect and it matches the bottoms that I currently have. I am going on vacation soon and I am excited about wearing my new swim outfit!!"}, {"review_2"=>"I think this item is good for someone that isn't as tiny as they would like to be, hides the less attractive parts."}, {"review_3"=>"true to size, sliming, and a great value, lots of styles to chose from, very satisfied"}]}

name_title: Azul By Maxine Of Hollywood Foiled Again Empire-Waist Swimdress - Plus
description: Bold and chic, this empire-waist swimdress will complement your curves and have you beach-ready in no time. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>{"review_1"=>"I absolutely LOVE this swimdress!!! I'm 32 and usually it's hard to find plus size bathing suits that aren't hideous with a bunch of flowers on it or \"matronly\". But this swimdress is AWESOME! The empire waist is very flattering and hides all the \"trouble areas\". The color is vibrant and the silver part is actually more shiny than you see in the pics. You can really tell that the material is not cheap as well. This is the first bathing suit I've bought in YEARS that I absolutely LOVE! Can't wait to wear it! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!"}}

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Tiered Tankini Swim Top or Hipster Bottoms - Plus
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"Love it! Looks great! Meets all of my needs in a swimsuit!"}, {"review_2"=>"I liked the look of this product, but when I tried it on I thought it looked like a maternity top. I felt that it made me look larger all over and it overemphasized the bust.."}, {"review_3"=>"Very pretty and fits well. Would have loved a different color for the skirt. Only black and turquoise to choose from. Would also like more of a choice in swimwear for plus size women."}, {"review_4"=>"This is absolutely beautiful. I love the pastel, cheerful colors and love the way it flows. It covers those areas (like the tummy) very well. It also is so beautiful as either a bathing suit top or just to wear around during the warmer days. Yep, love it!"}, {"review_5"=>"I love this swim bottom - fits guns true to size. I bought it on sale and it was a steal!"}, {"review_6"=>"I bought one of these tankinis and it fit and looked so good I put my best foot forward and bought a 2nd. I had coupons and discounts so the 2nd one was a true value. I would recommend this top whether you are a size 8 or a 24W. it looks great, feels great and I get lots of compliments in it. btw, I wear a 24W."}, {"review_7"=>"I love this swimsuit top! It is flowing and hides my belly but I can lift it up for a tan on my back."}, {"review_8"=>"Suit was average. Will see how it holds up I go to water aerobics 3-4 times a week."}]}

name_title: Azul by Maxine Of Hollywood Tropi-Call Me Faux-Skirtini Swimdress - Plus
description: Feminine and fun, this faux-skirtini swimdress will suit your style to a tee. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I just bought this suit at the store and LOVE it. I didn't think I could find a suit I could feel good wearing, but in this one I do. name_title: Baby B’gosh® 2-pc. Embroidered Babydoll Set - Baby Girls newborn-24m
description: Pretty florals and ruffles lend charm to this darling embroidered top and bloomers set. includes cap-sleeve top and bloomers top: embroidered yoke, fully lined, back-button closure bottom: tiered ruffle, cinched waist 100% cotton washable imported
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I bought this 2 piece outfit for my granddaughter. It's really cute and perfect for the summer. Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"Fit bed great. Quality construction. Would buy again."}, {"review_2"=>"This very popular line of bed covers and accessories is really beautiful! We are very glad we bought two of these and a pillow sham (another pillow sham would be nice) for our Guest House."}, {"review_3"=>"I ordered the 18\" oblong decorative pillow, but the material was just a flat cotton print that sort of matches the quilt colors--no textured yarns or cotton fill--so I sent it back."}, {"review_4"=>"There is a problem with the size of these quilts--they are way too short to cover a king-size bed and need to be about 2.5 feet longer (and about a foot wider) if you want it to both hang over the end of the bed and have the bed pillows covered at the top. The Full/Queen quilt is really too small. Please note that the bedspreads are the correct sizes--go with those instead of the quilts (plus they have a true queen size, not a full/queen). Had I picked up on the actual measurements, I would have ordered the bedspreads instead. Also, the cotton fill on the quilts makes them heavy, so they crush the warmth out of a bed--probably the bedspreads, again, would be a better choice. I highly recommend these for putting some class and color into a room."}, {"review_5"=>"Outstanding product. Love the extra length and width"}, {"review_6"=>"My order came in a timely manner, with no problems. The order was just what I expected from the description on line. I was splendidly pleased with this set. My only advice is to measure your bed because the size is different. A full sized spread fits to the floor on all sides perfectly on my queen bed with the stripes running horizontally. And frankly, with the stripes running in that direction, it makes my room appear much larger. Love it."}, {"review_9"=>"I bought a pair of these for a redo of my home office. I liked the stripes and they do look very nice with my slate blue room and dark wood furniture. However, as other customers have indicated, they are very, very thin even though they are lined - the lining is also thin. I also bought 2 of the valences since the drapes hang on either side of a wide window. The valences are of a good weight. However, both the drapery panels and the valences were very uneven in length. I had to shorten the drapes anyway and add a thermal lining (I made it), so I made the drape panels even when shortened them and then I sewed the lining to the top of the back side of the panels. Because the valences were also very uneven, I had to take them apart and make them more even before I could join them together to make a very wide valance. I had planned to just join the 2 valences by lightly stitching them together. :-( Getting the panels and valence ready to hang turn-out to be a rather large project!! Fortunately, I know how to sew!!! - and I am retired!"}, {"review_10"=>"I ordered this beautiful comforter and was so happy with it when it came, it is a nice lightweight and perfect for layers on your bed. It looks GREAT! However, it has only been on my bed for two days and it is separating at the seams in several places. I will keep it, but I have some hand sewing to do..."}]}

Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I received a free sample of Yu-Be lotion from a friend a few winters ago, and it is my absolute go to. I turn from Miss Desert Reptile to Miss Hydrated & Smooth. Really, Yu-Be works extraordinary well! This set is perfect. I've bought Yu-Be in the past (the cream) and used up every last ounce of it. I recently bought this set and I love it. It's a great deal for the two tubes of cream (which instantly smooths the skin out, especially on my face), the lip balm (which is actually helped me in using less chapsticks, lip balms, etc....normally I have to apply every five minutes, but not with Yu-Be), and the samples (which are really nice!). Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I have owned heated mattress pads in the past. I expected this one to be similar to the others. However, I was not very impressed with the quality of the product. The sides that go around the mattress are so long that you have to tuck them under the mattress which makes it difficult to get a sheet on. I understand that they try to accomodate all mattresses, but I don't know of any mattress that is that deep, it's ridiculous. It also has a plastic piece that connects to the plug that is on the top of the mattress pad on each side of the king size dual pad, so it is hard to avoid scratching your foot on it. I have never had a pad where that was on the top, it was always underneath the pad so it was smooth on the top. It has the same heating functions as all others and is uniform in warmth but the poor quality really takes away from my overall view of this product."}, {"review_2"=>"I have purchased several of these warmers over the years but know something's been changed. This company HAD the hottest warmers but this one barely gets warm and the auto-off feature was not on the others I want to stay warm all night not wake up cold they need to take that feature off. It seems now the quality of products are not there but the price keeps going up. Though the price of this one is excellent it's not worth the money. My house is old and cold so I need this. If you've purchased these in the past let me tell you the quality is GONE, GONE, GONE."}, {"review_3"=>"I have owned this item for three years now, and had to replace the whole thing after the first year as one of the controls went bad and kept \"E\" error on the control panel (king size 2 control unit). The second unit worked for a time, but now the same side that went bad before is now not heating at all, so this mattress pad is now going in the garbage can as landfill. I wish you could purchase a simple item like this and have it work as it should, Give me a good old vintage heated blanket with out electronic controls, they work the best."}, {"review_4"=>"Love this heated mattress pad! Ordered the queen size - it had dual controls which is a have to in my house! Love the zonal heating as my feet are always cold. The heated mattress pad actually relaxes my body and I'm not near as stiff in the mornings as I used to be. Also suffer from nightly repeated leg cramps and this pad has actually helped relax those a great deal, woohoo! Had a coupon and caught a sale - loved mine so much I ordered one for my daughter and her family and they love theirs too!"}, {"review_5"=>"My husband has poor blood circulation and freezes all of the time. This heated mattress pad is a game changer for him. Used with an electric blanket, this really helps him out. Only drawback is the additional heating wires at the feet: at first it feels really good, but then gets too hot. If there were a way to control that section independently, I would give the product an excellent overall rating. Otherwise, it performs just as expected/needed."}, {"review_6"=>"The only flaws to this product is that the Full Sized model has only one temperature control with two people in the bed who have different preferences. Also the raised plug is then on the bottom right corner of the bed and so during the night I scrape my foot over the connection. It would be nice if it was just over the edge of the mattress vs. on top. Love the warmth however and it heats up quickly."}, {"review_7"=>"I have this on all my beds. We enjoy the features that this mattress pad has. It has dual controls that plug in at the head of the bed. The plug in is smooth, flat and under the pillow area. It has a Nylon type skirt that is loose. Once you put your sheets on it is no longer a problem. It has reinforced openings in the mattress skirt for the plugs to slip in. It is a little tight but this helps to keep the plugs from slipping out when you install it. The dual controls have a digital display and an easy on & off button. You can feel the size difference between the up / down and on/ off. If you want to turn it on in the middle of the night you don't have to turn on a light, just reach over and feel for the right button. We have had these pads for more than 5 years and the warranty is wonderful. We have only had to have 1 replaced due to a malfunction in a controller. They sent us a new mattress pad and controllers. This too was a blessing. Now we have an extra pad to put down when we are doing laundry. This pad washes and dries wonderfully. It is not too thick and does not become \"lumpy\" like my quilted mattress pads. It is thin enough to leave on the bed all year round under our mattress protecting pad. I never have to worry about it burning me like a regular heating pad.It does not have a pre heat, but you can easily turn it on before you go to bed an it is ready when you are. It has a 1 to 9 temp. selector. I leave mine at 4. My husband likes 7 and it turns itself off in 10 hours. We don't have to fight for the covers because we are both just warm enough. Our cat has even learned to turn it on when she wants to snuggle in on cold winter days."}, {"review_8"=>"I had originally purchased another brand. One I had problems with around 10 years ago...thinking they improved since that time and was disappointed to find out they hadn't. So I called JCP and found what I replaced the old ones with and placed my order! These work great and there is no interruption during the night to reset the controls."}]}

name_title: SEPHORA COLLECTION Lip Liner To Go
description: What it is: A mini lip liner available in shades to match SEPHORA COLLECTION's lipstick colors. What it does: These lip liners can be used for perfect lip contouring at any time. They can also be used over the entire lip for a trendy, semi-matte finish. Each is made with a highly pigmented formula and is designed to be matched with a SEPHORA COLLECTION lipstick. Suggested Usage: -Outline lips with Lip liner to go. -Closely following the contour, apply a corresponding shade of lipstick -Lip liner to go can also be applied alone over the entire lip for a semi-matte finish. Size:0.025 ozIngredients:Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Synthetic Wax, Zeolite, Mica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, CI 15850 (Red 6), Polyethylene, CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Diisostearyl Malate, CI 73360 (Red 30), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl HydroxyhydroCInnamate, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter).
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"Summary: QUALITY GONE, LIP LINER DOES NOT SHARPENI have used the Sephora Collection lip liner for years - because I cannot seem to find the perfect shade by anyone else. I don't know why Sephora changes the design from a nice smooth casing to those off-brand pencils you used in elementary school, but now when I sharpen it, it keeps breaking off and making a mess of the pencil :("}, {"review_2"=>"i bought this at the store and last me longer i sometimes use it as my lipstick and it last a lot longer. cheap too"}, {"review_3"=>"This formula is amazing... one of my favorite lip liners from this collection is light brown"}, {"review_4"=>"This isn't the worst liner I ever tried, but it's nothing to write home about. category_tree: jcpenney|for the home|college life|view all cook & dine
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I have had this for months and it is the most complemented item I have ever owned. I use it everyday, love the blue color and love to look at it every time I go into the kitchen. I now base all my new purchases around this toaster oven. I have found guest gathered around it talking like it is a rare item. I have broiled steak, made toast and pizza in it many times. You will not be disappointed in this. I have a \"Retro\" kitchen now."}, {"review_2"=>"We bought this oven after researching all others. It meets our needs and expectations. So far, we are very pleased with its performance. Looks great too."}, {"review_3"=>"Love it."}, {"review_4"=>"I wanted something to help me cook (I hate to cook, can't afford to eat out everyday and microwave bites.) faster and more efficiently and this little oven is can do machine. The cabinets above the unit do not get hot, just a little warm even after the unit being on for several hours. Oh, and the unit is BIG. But I like it and frankly it looks nice on the counter. Clean up is a snap because everything fits in the dishwasher. If there is anything to complain about is the finish. I chose the black front and from a across the kitchen it looks fine but up close the finish has blotches in it, like water marks on a auto paint job. Being a mechanical engineer this kind of thing does not really bug me but still after spending the money spent the finish SHOULD be better. Overall I believe you can not go wrong purchasing this unit."}, {"review_5"=>"This oven is so nice, it looks so cool in my kitchen. Loved the aqua blue color but then I would have to change out my whole kitchen so I stayed with white :D I have had nothing but compliments. I used to have a smaller toaster oven but I could not fit much in it and usually had to cut everything smaller. Now, we baked a whole degornio (?) pizza in it and it fit very nicely. I love all the settings to chose from for auto times and then the choice for how toasted/baked I desire is very nice. I have been nothing but smiling since this arrived and we set it up in the kitchen. Yes it takes up space because it is a nice size but it is so worth it! Another thing is I love how easy it is to clean out the crumbs with the slide out tray! Thanks Kitchenaid... BRAVO!"}, {"review_6"=>"I love this countertop oven and would have given 5 Stars if the words on the display were easier to read. The print is way too small and the color makes it impossible to read unless you have a magnifier and extra light. I was really disappointed with this fact and had read it in a review but thought it wouldn't apply to me. I would have purchased it anyway but hopefully KitchenAid will improve this on future appliances."}, {"review_7"=>"This toaster oven replaces a Cuisinart toaster oven that started turning on at random times by itself. I never thought I would replace it with anything other than a Cuisinart. I am so glad I got the Kitchenaid instead. It looks so nice on my counter, and it is so easy to use. I've made toast and baked casseroles in it and everything turned out perfect. I love the \"frozen\" button. It takes all the guesswork out of toasting frozen bread. I gave this toaster oven 5 stars only because the choices didn't go up to 10. I absolutely love it and look forward to getting other Kitchenaid products to match the pretty yellow color."}, {"review_8"=>"This wonderful little appliance is something I should have purchased years ago. I live in a tiny apartment with no stove or oven so this KitchenAid Convection Oven really fits my place. I paid extra for the purple faceplate, but was pleased with the color when the oven arrived. So far, I've cooked Cornish game hens, pork roasts, pork chops, onion rings, breaded mushrooms, seafood, pizzas, brownies, and blueberry bread, all with excellent results. My only gripe ( and it is a minor one) is that the time/temperature dial sometimes feels a bit spongy and the feedback is less than reassuring for such a well regarded appliance manufacturer. I suspect this is not the norm for this particular appliance and that my experience is uncommon. Overall, I'm very pleased with this little oven and would recommend it without hesitation."}]}

Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I have had several heated throws over the years. This seemed to be a nice one, due to the little footsie pocket. The cord is not long enough for the heater control to rest on the sofa, or my side table."}, {"review_2"=>"It is inconvenient to use and I will not purchase another."}, {"review_3"=>"I got this for my 88-year-old mom who is always cold. Thank you JC Penneys!"}, {"review_4"=>"I found these electric throw blankets on sale before Christmas and they were a huge hit with my school age kids. I like that they have an automatic shut off (I think it's 3 hours) and the price was great. This was definitely a great buy for us!"}, {"review_5"=>"This blanket is long enough even though I am tall. I haven't washed it yet, but I like that feature, as it will be nice to not have it dry cleaned. The extra pillows are tasteful in the style."}, {"review_6"=>"I love the quality of the fabric. name_title: KitchenAid® 6-qt. Accessory Bowl KN2B6PEH
description: The lightweight feel and practicality of the KitchenAid 6-quart accessory bowl makes it convenient and easy to mix up your favorite treats. use with a stand mixer to make multiple batches without constantly switching bowls clean, simple design made of stainless steel for durability Dishwasher-safe; hand wash recommended. Imported.
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"I had the Kitchen Aid Mixer tilt glass bowl and thanks be it broke! I ordered the metal accessory bowl and it's weight is perfect! It's lightness is it's greatest feature as the bulk of the weight is in its contents which are easily managed. It can be difficult to mount as you have to place it on the posts whereupon it tilts up. It takes a bit of pressure to push the bowl down onto the lip so it's flat and even all around. To remove the bowl simply lift up on its handle. Once you manage this part you have it made. Makes using the mixer soooo much easier and better!! Very easy to clean the metal too."}, {"review_2"=>"A long awaited much needed necessity! Trying to make many desserts at once with almost ALL requiring beaten egg whites made this very much needed accessory a necessity! My birthday present to myself!"}, {"review_3"=>"This appeared to be of good quality - but DOES NOT FIT THE COSTCO KITCHENAID 6QT Stand Mixer."}, {"review_4"=>"To be most efficient with time, having a second interchangeable bowl for any electric mixer when baking is a necessity!"}]}

name_title: Best Chairs, Inc.® Contemporary Club Swivel Glider
description: Come home to a glider that both fits your style and also gives you the ease of rocking your little one to sleep in comfort.   premium cushioning fibers for comfort soft high-loft poly-filled back for extra support whisper smooth swivel glide base reversible seat cushion superior coil seating solid wood frame 39x32½x38½" some assembly required made in America
Reviews: {"review"=>[{"review_1"=>"This chair is not only classically stylish but also well-made and extremely comfy. I am 5'8\" and it suits me perfectly for nursing. Love that it both swivels around and rocks. Rocking is better for the developing nervous systems of infants than gliding because it provides sensory input on multiple planes of movement rather than just forward and backward motion. The cream color is a lovely raised paisley chenille. Only wish the back was a smidgen higher to rest my head in the middle if the night but I just prop a pillow and am good to go."}, {"review_2"=>"The brand BEST comes very highly recommended from many sources (including the book, \"Baby Bargains\") so I was thrilled that JCP carried it. I ordered this chair and thought that the frost color would be more white based on the image that comes up. The chair was delivered today (2 weeks time, easy delivery and great set up by very friendly guys) and it turns out it is more a light pale blue. The chair has a texture to it that can't be seen in close up images or in the color slides. Not quite corduroy but light piping (best way to describe it) and is not the same fabric that I thought it would be. Sometimes it's hard since you can't always see these items in stores so I've included an image."}, {"review_3"=>"Very stylish swivel glider that is extremely comfortable and a beautiful rich color material in a chocolate brown. I have a lot of back pain and this is the only chair that I have found to be comfortable to sit in for an extended period of time.I highly recommend the Best Chair Swivel/glider!"}, {"review_4"=>"I looked for a swivel chair for a long time, before ordering this one on line. No material swatch available .The color picture very poor but I trusted JCP & ordered. THE SIZE WAS GOOD, but the color not true and something about the base not right when sat upon,It tilted forward so one could almost slide out . With base correction c/b much better. Disappointed because I liked the swivel. Fabric swatch would be a real plus!This fabric more a bedrm or nursery color- thisbase defintely needs adjustment"}, {"review_5"=>"I was looking for a \"cottage\" chair for over a year, and finally found just what I was looking for at JCP! The entire process involved in ordering this chair from JCP has been a pleasure from placing the order to its delivery. The gentlemen who delivered the chair were both attentive and professional. The gentleman who installed the swivel to the chair would not leave until BOTH he and I were completely satisfied. I've had company several times since receiving the chair, and I have gotten compliments on its appearance, construction and comfort."}, {"review_6"=>"I'm 5'7 and on the heavy side, and this chair can take my weight and my feet hit the floor perfectly. I agree, it'd be nice if it were a smidge taller so I could rest my head. It's very firm which makes it easier to get in/out of. The delivery was not 3 weeks upon order, more like 5. The delivery team was very nice, on time, they called ahead and came in and set everything up. We got our chair in the spring green and it's beautiful."}, {"review_7"=>"Very comfy cozy \"cottage\" looking chair. Like the swivel & rocker feature. Nice material & neutral color."}]}
